items.content_html: Turbo Array is a lightweight, high-performance library that allows you to build lazy evaluation pipelines for arrays. It supports operations like filter, map, reduce, forEach, and join, executing them efficiently. A method build with Turbo Array is 4x faster than vanilla version.
items.title: nigrosimone/turbo-array: Turbo Array is a lightweight, high-performance library that allows you to build lazy evaluation pipelines for arrays. It supports operations like filter, map, reduce, forEach, and join, executing them efficiently.  A method build with Turbo Array is 4x faster than vanilla version.

items.content_html: TikTok Downloader with Vue.js A lightweight and responsive TikTok video downloader built with Vue.js. Paste the video link to download TikTok videos with or without a watermark. Features fast performance, clean UI, and easy integration.

items.content_html: Minerva is a lightweight art portfolio website built with JavaScript, React, and Vite, designed for fast performance and a minimalistic aesthetic. It offers a sleek, responsive platform for artists to showcase their work and effortlessly share their creative journeys online.

It offers a sleek, responsive platform for artists to showcase their work and effortlessly share their creative journeys online.
